title: very nice special effect!!!!
review: First of all, cool special effect!!!!!!! It was so amazing!!!!!!! How iron man suit mark 42 could attached from the distance, that is the coolest thing in iron man 3. And tony stark can control the iron man suit when he didn't in the iron man suit with J.A.R.V.I.SThe story is awesome i think because people didn't expect that the mandarin is just a joke and Aldrich Killian is the mandarin. Aldrich Killian is an awesome villain because he can create fire and so awesome!!!!Overall, i think is totally worth it to watch iron man 3!!! The best marvel's best movie is iron man 3!!!!!!
